text: Hey Louise, how are you? I havenâ€™t heard anything back from any of the opportunities I applied for. Do you know of any other places looking at the moment? Or of any training i could take that might improve my chances? Thanks for any help you can give me.

Hey jess!  I will chase up One of Us Talent team for you. Escape studios do a short course in production <https://www.pearsoncollegelondon.ac.uk/find-a-course/short-courses/producing-for-vfx-full-time.html?intid=ESC_CL_CB4_8#|https://www.pearsoncollegelondon.ac.uk/find-a-course/short-courses/producing-for-vfx-full-time.html?intid=ESC_CL_CB4_8>

attachments.title: Producing for VFX (6 weeks) | Short courses | Escape Studios
attachments.text: We've packed the essentials of production into this new course, where you'll have 6 weeks of intensive training in our studios.
attachments.fallback: Producing for VFX (6 weeks) | Short courses | Escape Studios

text: The other thing to consider is to try applying for production assistant roles, the salaries will be lower though, around 21k - not sure if you are able to take a pay cut?
